duties_responsibilities.duty: Support a team with assigned tasks, projects, correspondence, administration tasks, tracking project deliverables, dates, and monitoring deadlines.
Develop, maintain, and monitor accurate and complete files for projects and programs.
Communicate issues to management prior to reaching critical status.
Assist with administrative preparation and coordination for meetings and events.
Prepare and submit purchase orders and processes contractor invoices for various office management functions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalentAssociate degree or equivalent work experience preferred
